title: League of Legends Shortcut
body:
This current patch I was gonna download the league of legends patch, but my internet ran out 20 seconds into it, I got it recharged yesterday and now everytime I click on the league of legends shortcut it comes up with the "LEAGUE OF LEGENDS" Icon in the middle of my screen for 2 seconds and then leaves. It says its Opening league but it just cancels the shortcut altogether.

How/What do I do to fix this issue.

replies.body:
Hey there, try this:

Delete the lol_launcher and lol_patcher folders located in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects.

Restart PC and without opening anything else (turn off any background programs as well) run the patcher again, the LoL logo will stay there for a while with a little progress bar underneath it. Do not try to run LoL again or any other program, the launcher should eventually appear.

If this doesn't work I'd recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can get a better understanding of what's going on and provide more specific instructions.
